sentences.sContent: He undid the padlock and eased back the lid.
sentences.sCn: 他打开挂锁，轻轻推开箱盖。

sentences.sContent: Eddie parked his bicycle against a lamppost and padlocked it.
sentences.sCn: 艾迪把他的自行车停靠在一根路灯柱上，然后用挂锁锁上了。

trans.tranOther: a lock that you can put on a gate, door, bicycle etc
If you padlock something, you lock it or fasten it to something else using a padlock
